testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to update the existing subscriber information via API connection.
testcase.name: The update of the desired subscriber record via API should be confirmed by sending a
testcase.system-out: Given The API user sets "api/subscriber/details/42" path parameters.........passed And The API user records the response from the api subscriber details endpoint with valid authorization information.passed Then The API user verifies that the status code is 200......................passed And The API user verifies that the email information in the response body is "ayilmaz@gmail.com".passed
